classes.description: Logs interactions related to coding, including prompts, responses, and metadata

properties.name: prompt
properties.description: The coding prompt/question sent to the LLM

properties.name: response
properties.description: The response received from the LLM

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: The timestamp when the interaction occurred

properties.name: language
properties.description: The programming language related to the interaction

properties.name: technologies
properties.description: Technologies, libraries, or frameworks mentioned in the interaction

properties.name: metadata
properties.description: Additional metadata about the interaction (e.g., question complexity, tags)
